title: What is the best way to write music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am no expert here but I can provide you with my advice on how I write songs. I mainly write rap songs, with those songs there has to be the rhyming, which means and how it relates to your message all this encompassed in an idea. Rap songs just like any other tune desire to have this attributes. Constructing your writing muscle is like each other muscle writing songs every day, I mainly write once I sense inspired and I'm prompted once I begin writing, so songwriting it's simply beautiful.
What is the best way to write music? There is no one “best way.” Every composer is different, has different talents and abilities and different work habits.
